Poland buys Saab grenade launchers in $1.63 billion dealPoland has signed a deal to buy anti-tank grenade launchers from Sweden's Saab in a deal worth around 6.5 billion zlotys ($1.63 billion), its Defence Minister Wladyslaw Kosiniak-Kamysz said on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 15:09:37 GMT W6644FH3PBNA7PGNA3ROCPDSSE https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/poland-buys-saab-grenade-launchers-163-billion-deal-2024-03-04/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Trump wins Colorado ballot disqualification case at US Supreme CourtThe U.S. Supreme Court handed Donald Trump a major victory on Monday as he campaigns to regain the presidency, overturning a judicial decision that had excluded him from Colorado's ballot under a constitutional provision involving insurrection for inciting and supporting the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol attack. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 15:07:08 GMT 5JFEBPJLWNIBNBW3YGA3RV3TDY https://www.reuters.com/legal/trump-wins-colorado-ballot-disqualification-case-us-supreme-court-2024-03-04/Andrew Chung, John Kruzel合法的
Iran election turnout hits record low, hardliners maintain grip on parliamentTurnout in Iran's parliamentary election was around 41%, the country's interior minister said on Monday, the lowest participation since Iran's 1979 Islamic revolution that swept the clerical rulers into power. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 15:06:57 GMT E5W37ZU2SBJAXHOL5WDZZL奇米https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-election-turnout-hits-record-low-hardliners-maintain-grip-parliament-2024-03-04/Parisa Hafezi世界中东
Closing gender gap could lift global GDP more than 20%, World Bank saysEnding discriminatory laws and practices that prevent women from working or starting businesses could raise global gross domestic product by more than 20%, which would double the rate of global growth over the next decade, the World Bank said on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 15:03:09 GMT EGV6YFWRYJK5PLZERJV33LQEJA https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/society-equity/fitting-gender-gap-could-lift-global-gdp-more-than-20-world-bank-says-2024-03-04/Andrea Shalal可持续发展社会与公平
French foie gras back on menus after bird flu spares ducksA jump in foie gras output this winter as France was virtually spared from bird flu that had ravaged flocks in previous years will allow chefs to have enough of the delicacy when visitors rush to Paris for the Olympics, producers said on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 14:53:52 GMT EQZQT5OVSVMADFREQUQL4Y27YY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/french-foie-gras-back-menus-after-bird-flu-spares-ducks-2024-03-04/Reuters世界欧洲
ICC judges allow in absentia hearings for charges against Ugandan warlord Joseph KonyJudges at the International Criminal Court (ICC) on Monday ruled that prosecutors can bring a hearing on charges against fugitive Ugandan warlord Joseph Kony in his absence on Oct. 15. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 14:52:49 GMT B4I2XUFRNJOX3PMUAGIPTKVGXI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/icc-judges-allow-absentia-hearings-charges-against-ugandan-warlord-joseph-kony-2024-03-04/Reuters世界非洲
Panama GDP growth expected to slow to 2.5% in 2024 on First Quantum mine closure, IMF saysPanama's economy is expected to see growth slow in 2024 to 2.5%, from 7.5% in the previous year, as a result of the closure of First Quantum Minerals' lucrative copper mine in the country, the International Monetary Fund (IMF) said on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 14:48:30 GMT KSPSDXU74JNBJORBVQWBAASUT4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/panama-gdp-growth-expected-slow-25-2024-first-quantum-mine-closure-imf-says-2024-03-04/Reuters市场
US tells citizens to leave Haiti after jailbreakThe United States called for its citizens to leave Haiti "as soon as possible" after violence escalated over the weekend, which saw 15,000 more people flee the fighting and armed men break thousands of inmates from Haiti's largest prison. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 14:37:58 GMT NJ5NZXIKU5K6XBIOOZI2WN27PY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/us-tells-citizens-leave-haiti-as-soon-possible-after-violent-weekend-2024-03-04/Reuters世界美洲
After blunt assessment of Gaza 'catastrophe,' VP Harris to meet Israel's GantzIsraeli war cabinet member Benny Gantz will meet with Vice President Kamala Harris and other top U.S. officials in Washington on Monday as the White House ramps up pressure on Israel to protect civilians in Gaza during its war with Hamas. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 14:34:37 GMT 3MZNQW6JNVMQRIYOD64WWN7FRY https://www.reuters.com/world/after-blunt-assessment-gaza-catastrophe-vp-harris-meet-israels-gantz-2024-03-04/Jeff Mason世界
Greece records hottest ever winter, raising fears of summer firesThis winter was the hottest on record for Greece, according to data analysed by Greek scientists, threatening the viability of crops and raising fears of another summer of devastating wildfires. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 14:32:44 GMT 6M67VY77NVL6ZLMPTEK2ITU5KE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/greece-records-hottest-ever-winter-raise-fears-summer-fires-2024-03-04/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
Argentine state news agency Telam shut after Milei threatWorkers at Argentine state news agency Telam found the doors of the 80-year-old institution's office barred on Monday and were told to down tools for at least a week after libertarian President Javier Milei said he would close the agency down. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 14:28:36 GMT CQXJ45T4JRPQ7MP3C6WWJ3G554 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentine-state-news-agency-telam-shut-after-milei-threat-2024-03-04/Lucila Sigal世界美洲
